oneMeanTest 0.1.0

Generate example product weight data

generate_example_weights.Rd

Convenience function to generate product weights (e.g., grams) for illustrating the one-sample t-test.

Usage

generate_example_weights(n = 30, mean = 500, sd = 5, seed = NULL)

Arguments

n

Sample size.

mean

True mean used for simulation.

sd

True standard deviation used for simulation.

seed

Optional integer seed for reproducibility.

Value

A numeric vector of length n.
